data.title: Dwight Howard Player Profile, Los Angeles Lakers
data.meta_description: Get the latest news, stats and more about Dwight Howard on RealGM.com
data.text: Jun 24, 2004 - The Orlando Magic selected Dwight Howard in Round 1 with Pick 1 in the 2004 NBA Draft. Jul 7, 2004 - Dwight Howard signed a multi-year contract with the Orlando Magic. Mar 27, 2006 - The Orlando Magic exercised their Team Option to extend the contract of Dwight Howard. Jul 12, 2007 - Dwight Howard signed a rookie scale extension with the Orlando Magic. Mar 15, 2012 - Dwight Howard voided his ability to terminate his contract early. Aug 10, 2012 - Dwight Howard was acquired by the Los Angeles Lakers, along with Earl Clark, Chris Duhon and a TPE, from the Orlando Magic in exchange for Andrew Bynum, Christian Eyenga, Josh McRoberts, a conditional 2015 2nd round pick (LAL own) and a conditional 2019 1st round pick (LAL own). Jul 1, 2013 - Dwight Howard, previously with the Los Angeles Lakers, became a free agent. Jul 13, 2013 - Dwight Howard signed a multi-year contract with the Houston Rockets. Jul 1, 2016 - Dwight Howard, previously with the Houston Rockets, became a free agent. Jul 9, 2016 - The Houston Rockets renounced their free-agent exception rights to Dwight Howard. Jul 12, 2016 - Dwight Howard signed a multi-year contract with the Atlanta Hawks. Jun 20, 2017 - Dwight Howard was acquired by the Charlotte Hornets, along with a 2017 2nd round pick (BRK own), from the Atlanta Hawks in exchange for Marco Belinelli, Miles Plumlee and a 2017 2nd round pick (CHA own). Jul 6, 2018 - Dwight Howard was acquired by the Brooklyn Nets from the Charlotte Hornets in exchange for Timofey Mozgov, the draft rights to Hamidou Diallo, a 2021 2nd round pick (BRK own) and cash. Jul 7, 2018 - The Brooklyn Nets placed the contract of Dwight Howard on waivers. Jul 9, 2018 - Dwight Howard, previously with the Brooklyn Nets, became a free agent. Jul 11, 2018 - Dwight Howard signed a multi-year contract with the Washington Wizards. Apr 18, 2019 - Dwight Howard exercised a Player Option to extend his contract. Jul 6, 2019 - Dwight Howard was acquired by the Memphis Grizzlies, along with a TPE, from the Washington Wizards in exchange for C.J. Miles. Aug 24, 2019 - The Memphis Grizzlies placed the contract of Dwight Howard on waivers. Aug 26, 2019 - Dwight Howard, previously with the Memphis Grizzlies, became a free agent. Aug 26, 2019 - Dwight Howard signed a contract with the Los Angeles Lakers. Nov 21, 2020 - Dwight Howard, previously with the Los Angeles Lakers, became a free agent. Nov 21, 2020 - Dwight Howard signed a contract with the Philadelphia Sixers. Aug 3, 2021 - Dwight Howard, previously with the Philadelphia Sixers, became a free agent. Aug 6, 2021 - Dwight Howard signed a contract with the Los Angeles Lakers.
